governmentServicePage.description: REQUIRED pattern for ALL Alberta Government service pages
governmentServicePage.rule: Every government service page MUST use GoabOneColumnLayout as the root component
governmentServicePage.template: GoabOneColumnLayout > header slot (GoabMicrositeHeader + GoabAppHeader) > GoabPageBlock (content) > footer slot (GoabAppFooter)

requiredStructure.headerSlot: section slot='header' containing GoabMicrositeHeader and/or GoabAppHeader
requiredStructure.content: GoabPageBlock with specified width containing all page content

neverUse: div or generic HTML elements as page root
Multiple GoabPageBlock elements on same page
governmentServicePage.exceptionPolicy: NO EXCEPTIONS - this pattern is mandatory for government compliance and accessibility
complianceReasons: Ensures consistent government branding across all services
Maintains accessibility standards with proper landmark structure
Provides responsive behavior required for mobile government services
Guarantees proper header hierarchy for screen readers
Enforces Alberta Government visual identity standards

validationChecklist: ✓ All content wrapped in single GoabPageBlock
✓ No custom wrapper divs around layout

headerToContentRule.rule: ALWAYS add mt='2xl' to first content element after any header
headerToContentRule.example: <GoabText tag='h1' mt='2xl' mb='l'>First content after header</GoabText>
headerToContentRule.enforcement: Every first element in GoabPageBlock or after headers must have mt='2xl'
headerToContentRule.rationale: Provides consistent separation between header navigation and page content across all government services

noCustomStyling.rule: NEVER use style={}, className with custom CSS, or any custom styling on GoA components
noCustomStyling.enforcement: Components provide ALL necessary styling through props only
noCustomStyling.rationale: Design system components are designed to handle all visual requirements through documented props
correct: ✅ Use only documented component properties: gap, direction, alignment, mb, mt
✅ Trust the design system - GoA components handle all styling automatically
✅ Use spacing props: mt='2xl', mb='l', gap='m'

emergencyOverride.policy: NO EXCEPTIONS - If styling needs cannot be met with component props, contact design system team
emergencyOverride.escalation: Custom styling breaks government compliance and accessibility standards

layoutStructureEnforcement.rule: NEVER bypass GoabOneColumnLayout for government service pages
layoutStructureEnforcement.enforcement: All government service pages must follow: GoabOneColumnLayout > header slot > GoabPageBlock > footer slot
layoutStructureEnforcement.compliance: Required for accessibility, government branding, and responsive behavior standards

designDataAnalysis.rule: When user provides Figma JSON or design specifications, ALWAYS analyze for exact component configurations
layoutSpecificRules: Extract spacing values from design data and map to GoA spacing tokens
Match exact width specifications from provided JSON to GoabPageBlock width prop
Follow component hierarchy from design files while maintaining GoabOneColumnLayout structure
Never assume layout patterns without design confirmation - use provided specifications
Validate that custom spacing in designs maps to available GoA spacing tokens
Preserve exact content widths specified in design data
dataExtractionPriority: 1. Page width specifications → GoabPageBlock width prop
2. Spacing between elements → component spacing props (mt, mb, gap)
3. Component hierarchy → proper slot and nesting structure
4. Header configurations → GoabMicrositeHeader and GoabAppHeader props
5. Content organization → GoabContainer and GoabBlock usage

designToComponentMapping.pageWidth: Map design width to GoabPageBlock width prop (704px, 960px, 1200px, full)
designToComponentMapping.elementSpacing: Convert design spacing to GoA tokens (3xs through 4xl)
designToComponentMapping.sectionBreaks: Use GoabContainer or spacing props for visual separation
designToComponentMapping.headerElements: Map to GoabMicrositeHeader and GoabAppHeader configurations

commonMistakes: Using invalid tokens: '0', 'small', 'medium', 'large'
Using pixel values directly instead of tokens
Mixing CSS spacing with component props

designDataSpacingConversion.rule: When design data shows specific pixel values, convert to nearest GoA spacing token

pageContentSpacing.description: Standard spacing patterns for page content within GoabPageBlock components

pageToFooter.rule: ALWAYS add mb='3xl' to the last content element before footer
pageToFooter.reason: Provides proper separation between page content and footer
pageToFooter.applies: Last element inside GoabPageBlock before footer appears

headerToBackButton.rule: When back button present, use mt='m' on back button
headerToBackButton.reason: Proper spacing from header to back navigation
headerToBackButton.applies: First element after header when navigation is needed

backButtonToHeading.rule: ALWAYS add mb='2xl' between back button and first heading
backButtonToHeading.reason: Maintains proper hierarchy and breathing room
backButtonToHeading.applies: When back button precedes main page heading

firstContentElement.rule: ALWAYS add mt='2xl' to first content element (when no back button)
firstContentElement.reason: Provides proper separation between header and content
firstContentElement.applies: First element inside GoabPageBlock when no back button present

spacingStrategy.primaryRule: Use mb (margin-bottom) instead of mt (margin-top) for consistent spacing flow
spacingStrategy.rationale: Each component controls space it creates, preventing spacing conflicts
spacingStrategy.exceptions: Only use mt for first element positioning from header or special layout needs

withBackButton.pattern: Header → BackButton(mt='m', mb='2xl') → PageContent → LastElement(mb='3xl') → Footer
withBackButton.example:
<GoabPageBlock width='704px'>
  <GoabBackButton mt='m' mb='2xl'>Back to Services</GoabBackButton>
  <GoabText tag='h1' mb='l'>Application Form</GoabText>
  <GoabText tag='p' mb='xl'>Content...</GoabText>
  <GoabButton type='primary' mb='3xl'>Submit</GoabButton>
</GoabPageBlock>

Inconsistent spacing between back button and heading

Using custom CSS margins instead of component spacing props

sectionSpacing.description: Spacing between major content sections within a page

betweenMajorSections.usage: Between major page sections (Overview → Requirements → Process)
betweenMajorSections.guideline: Use 2xl for primary sections, xl for secondary sections

betweenSubsections.usage: Between subsections within a major section
betweenSubsections.guideline: Use xl for important subsections, l for minor subsections

afterCallToAction.usage: After buttons, forms, or interactive elements
afterCallToAction.guideline: Separates action elements from following content

beforeImportantContent.usage: Before callouts, important notices, or key information

exampleImplementation.react:
// Service page with proper section spacing
<GoabPageBlock width="704px">
  <GoabText tag="h1" size="xl" mt="2xl" mb="l">
    Service Name
  </GoabText>
  
  <GoabText tag="p" size="m" mb="xl">
    Service description...
  </GoabText>
  
  {/* Major section spacing */}
  <GoabText tag="h2" size="l" mt="2xl" mb="m">
    Before you begin
  </GoabText>
  
  <GoabText tag="p" size="m" mb="l">
    Requirements content...
  </GoabText>
  
  {/* Subsection spacing */}
  <GoabText tag="h3" size="m" mt="xl" mb="s">
    Required documents
  </GoabText>
  
  <GoabList mb="xl">
    <GoabListItem>Document 1</GoabListItem>
    <GoabListItem>Document 2</GoabListItem>
  </GoabList>
  
  {/* Call to action with proper spacing */}
  <GoabButton type="primary" mb="2xl">
    Start Application
  </GoabButton>
  
  {/* Final section */}
  <GoabText tag="h2" size="l" mt="2xl" mb="m">
    Support
  </GoabText>
  
  <GoabText tag="p" size="m" mb="3xl">
    Contact information...
  </GoabText>
</GoabPageBlock>

bestPractices: Always wrap content in GoabPageBlock to get proper margins and centering
